meta.description: Determine the optimal number of dine-in places and food-trucks to open to minimize the total number of stores while meeting sandwich production and employee constraints.

sets.name: STORE_TYPES
sets.description: Types of stores the company can open.

params.name: sandwich_capacity
params.description: Number of sandwiches each type of store can make per day.

params.name: employee_requirement
params.description: Number of employees required to operate each type of store.

params.name: min_sandwiches
params.description: Minimum number of sandwiches that must be made per day.

vars.name: num_stores
vars.description: Number of each type of store to open.

objective.name: min_total_stores
objective.description: Minimize the total number of stores opened.

constraints.name: sandwich_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least the minimum number of sandwiches are made per day.

constraints.name: employee_limit
constraints.description: Ensure the total number of employees used does not exceed the available employees.
